result.name: SPARK_MASTER_WORKERS_COUNT
result.description: The number of active workers on the master.

result.description: Running application count on the master.

result.description: Waiting application count on the master.

result.name: SPARK_MASTER_JVM_MEMORY_USED
result.description: Memory used by the JVM on the master.

result.description: Memory committed by the JVM on the master.

result.name: SPARK_MASTER_JVM_HEAP_MEMORY_USED
result.description: Heap memory used by the JVM on the master.

result.description: Percentage of heap memory used by the JVM on the master.

result.description: Non-heap memory committed by the JVM on the master.
